      Gets FriendsList from the server

      On error of server request
      void onSuccess(org.json.JSONArray s)
      On Success of server response JsonArray, s is transformed into an ArrayList and the list is set to friends List
      void onSuccess(java.lang.String s)
      On Success of server response string, s is either printed in a toast if the user is already on the friends list or is added to the User's friendsList
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> retrieveList()
      Returns String ArrayList of Friends
      void setList(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> s)
